The Washington Post is DC's oldest newspaper, with its first issue being published in 1877.
The Guardian was founded in Manchester in 1821 and has received numerous journalism awards, including the British Press Awards' 2014 National Newspaper of the Year.
The Boston Globe was founded in 1872 and has received 23 Pulitzer prizes since 1966.
Most USA Today articles are often low in substance and some are even rewrites of other sources.
Time Magazine has been around since 1923 and is known to cite all sources, making it very credible.

Business Insider has been accused of both left-wing and right-wing political bias in recent years.
